Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a game.

      Game class constructor.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(String nickname, GameListener listener) throws DeskIsFullException, PlayerAlreadyJoinedException, RemoteException, CannotJoinGameException
      Method for adding a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      listener - The game listener.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether a player has been added to the game or not.
      Throws:
      DeskIsFullException - If the game is already full and no more players can join.
      PlayerAlreadyJoinedException - If a player with the same nickname has already joined the game.
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote communication.
      CannotJoinGameException - If the game is not in a state that allows new players to join.

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method for removing a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value indicating whether a player has been removed from the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote communication.

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(String receiver, String sender, String text) throws RemoteException
      Method to add a message to the game chat.
      Parameters:
      receiver - The nickname of the player receiving the message.
      sender - The nickname of the player who wrote the message.
      text - The text of the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote communication.

      public boolean stopGame()
      Method for stopping the game if the two decks are exhausted or if a player has reached the established points.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the game must end or not.
